message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be a valuable asset to you. I'm asking for $13,000 to start negotiations.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $9,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $11,500.  I believe this product will bring you a lot of value.
I'm still interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $10,000. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
